name: SantaTracker
0:
”Alexa, Ask Santa Tracker where Santa is.”
”Alexa, Ask Santa Tracker for Santa.”
”Alexa, Ask Santa Tracker for Santa's location.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa tracker
des:
Do you want to know where Santa is right now? Then this skill is for you! He might be fixing his sleigh, feeding the reindeer, or updating his list of who is naughty or nice!

If you say "Alexa, Ask Santa Tracker for Santa", the skill will respond with a bit of information on what Santa is doing right now. 

How does the skill work? A highly talented team of informant elves lives with Santa at the North Pole and provides us the information. Ever since Santa went missing a few years ago, the elves have planted satellite GPS sensors in his Santa's clothes, on his sleigh, and in the reindeer collars to make sure that he doesn't get lost again. 

At the North Pole, pretty much everyone but Santa knows that Santa is being tracked (even Mrs. Claus) but nobody tells him because they think it will make him nervous.

If you need more help, you can just say "Alexa, Start Santa Tracker" and the skill will guide you thru how to use the skill.

Image derived from fotomelia free image catalog (images-gratuites-libres-de-droits-noel)
City/time zone information derived from worldtimezone site
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
